help.info: Test if a polyhedron shares a facet with another polyhedron.
help.descr:
Return true if the polyhedron P shares a facet with polyhedron Q. Both polyhedrons must be in H-representation. If they are not, the irredundant H-representation will be computed.
Basically, the function tests if polyhedra P and S are adjacent by solving LP problem consecutively for each facet. If you want to test just specific facets, you can provide them in fP and fQ arguments.

input.name: fP
input.descr: Index of a facet to test from polyhedron P.

input.name: fQ
input.descr: Index of a facet to test from polyhedron Q.

output.name: ts
output.descr: Logical statement if the polyhedron P shares a facet with Q.

output.name: iP
output.descr: Index of a facet from polyhedron P that is common with polyhedron Q.

output.name: iQ
output.descr: Index of a facet from polyhedron Q that is common with polyhedron P.
